item.title: Where do i stop all my skills at 99?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

The problem is probably the 300.0 You might not have. Replace yours with mines:

[code]
public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 99;
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i stop all my skills at 99?
